head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths SULLIVAN, MSGR. DANIEL

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths SULLIVAN, MSGR. DANIEL

block.p: SULLIVAN-Msgr. Daniel, of Staten Island, on June 9, 2000. Beloved brother of Joan C. Butler. Pastor Emeritus of St. Sylvester R.C. Church, SI. Funeral will be Thursday, June 15. Mass of Christian Burial 11 AM, St. Sylvester R.C. Church. Interment St. Raymond Cemetery, Bronx, NY. Virginia Funeral Chapel, 718-987-2828.
